io.openmessaging.message

Interface MessageFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Producer

    public interface MessageFactory
    A factory interface for creating Message objects.
    Since:
    OMS 1.0.0
    Version:
    OMS 1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message createMessage(String queueName, byte[] body)
      Creates a Message object.

    • Method Detail

      • createMessage

        Message createMessage(String queueName,
                      byte[] body)
        Creates a Message object. A Message object is used to send a message containing a stream of uninterpreted bytes.

        The returned Message object only can be sent to the specified queue.

        Parameters:
        queueName - the target queue to send
        body - the body data for a message
        Returns:
        the created Message object
        Throws:
        OMSMessageFormatException - when body exceed the maximum length or others.
